name: 2.4 inch (6 cm) Set of 3 Octave Concrete Pot with Wooden Plate (Pista Green, Rustic White)
description: This premium concrete planter is contemporary and hand poured offering a unique design with a luxurious look. Perfect for planting live plants or floral arrangements.Concrete planters provide dual benefit of luxury and durability. This planter is a perfect piece to display succulent plants, air-plants or any other small plant which can add beauty to any centerpiece, table setting or office desks.

name: Uri 5 tier hanging set for ronda no. 1412 planters (Black)
description: Reduce your place investment for the greenery by adding this hanging set.Fix the T at first. After fixing the T bracket to the wall hook the S Hook. Fix one end of the 3 Slings to S Hook, and another end of slings to the first ring. First Uri is ready.

name: Podocarpus Macrophyllus, Buddhist Pine, Fern Pine - Plant
description: Growing Podocarpus is an easy way to add a tropical flair to your garden. When you know how to care for Podocarpus plants, you will be rewarded with many years of lovely evergreen plant.

name: Zamioculcas zamiifolia, ZZ Plant - Plant
Combo_Constituents: Zamioculcas zamiifolia, ZZ Plant - Plant,4 inch (10 cm) Grower Round Plastic Pot (Black),4.5 inch (11 cm) Ronda No. 1110 Round Plastic Planter (Yellow)
description: The ZZ Plant is one of the very popular foliage plants used in homes and offices around the world for its small glossy leaves and easy maintenance. ZZ plant is almost impossible to kill.

name: 1+1 Free - Water Cress - Herb Seeds

name: Refill Pack for Home Compost Kit (For Family of 2)
description: Composting is a simple way to add nutrient-rich humus which fuels plant growth and restores vitality to depleted soil. It is also free, easy to make, and good for the environment

name: My Organic Garden (Plant Protection and Enhancer Kit)
description: Grow everything natural, completely organic, absolutely free from pesticide and harmful chemicals with My Organic Garden kit. It is a one-stop solution to manage your garden.

name: Jeevamrut (Plant Growth Tonic) - 500 ml
description: Jeevamrut is an excellent plant growth tonic with 100 % organic ingredients.Jeevamrut is a liquid organic manure popularly used as means of organic gardening. It is considered to be an excellent source of natural carbon, biomass, nitrogen, phosphorous potassium and lot of other micro nutrients required for the plants.

name: Sanjeevani (Rose Blooming Tonic) - 50 ml (Set of 2)
description: Sanjeevani is an excellent rose blooming tonic with 100 % organic ingredients. Best for home gardeners.Sanjeevani is a liquid organic manure specially formulated for Rose plants. It is considered to be an excellent source of natural carbon, biomass, nitrogen, phosphorous potassium and lot of other micro nutrients required for the plants.Organic ingredients of SanjeevaniCow dung extractCow urineFresh fruitsWater.

name: Potting Soil Mix for Lilies and Bulbs - 5 kg
description: Quality of the growing medium decides the quality of the plants. Soil in the pots/containers should be well drained and aerated. It should still retain moisture.Contents: Soil, Perlite, Vermiculite, Cocochips, Vermicompost

name: Potting Soil Mix for Cactus and Succulent plants - 3 kg
description: Quality of the growing medium decides the quality of the plants. Soil in the pots/containers should be well drained and aerated. It should still retain moisture.Contents: Soil, Perlite, Vermiculite, Cocochips, Vermicompost.

name: DIY Round Glass Vase Couple Terrarium
About: In this terrarium, you will get 3 Graptosedum succulents in a transparent glass, stone sand of different colors, pebbles, garden toys, preserve moss.The succulent used is easy to grow.Increases the look of any empty space
description: In this terrarium, you will get 3 Graptosedum succulents in a transparent glass, stone sand of different colors, pebbles, garden toys, preserve moss.

description: Bright green terrarium pack contains attractive two terrariums. You can enjoy the miniature indoor garden at your home.

description: A pack of 2 evergreen round terrarium which can adorn to add some greenery to your room or house.

name: Hanging pyramidal terrarium (7.5in Ht)
description: Hanging pyramidal terrarium to create miniature scenes and enhance the beauty of the house.

name: Hanging pentagon terrarium (7.5in Ht)
description: Hanging pentagon terrarium to create miniature scenes. This indoor gardening can give pleasure to you and your family or friends.

name: Basics of Plant Parenting - Workshop
description: Are you new to gardening? Worried about your plants? House plants have hit a new height in popularity as many of us now spend more time at home than ever before! Learn how to keep your plants happy and healthy. We are back with our plant care workshop to assist you to find the right plant for your space and care for that as well. We'll offer you some plant care tips that will set you up for success, no matter at what stage you are in your plant care journey.

name: Kitchen Gardening for Beginners - Workshop
description: On popular demand, samgardenstore is here with another edition of the Kitchen Gardening Workshop for Beginners, where we not only reintroduce you to healthy and sustainable eating but also help you to walk through the process of growing your own food.In this era of chemical-laden food, not only the body but also the soul is deprived of nutrition. Starting a Kitchen garden will not only give you organic produce right from your backyard to relish but will also bring happiness and joy to your plate.

name: Grow your own Microgreens - Workshop
description: Did you know that nutrient-dense Microgreens happen to be more nutritious than mature vegetables?Harvesting microgreens are ideal for beginners and city homes that have less space and sunlight. Learn to grow fresh organic microgreens like baby spinach, baby methi, mustard and likes at home!

name: Kokedama Making Workshop
description: Do not mind getting your hands dirty? Try something new! samgardenstore is back with another edition of Kokedama Workshop. Experts from samgardenstore are conducting a 90-minute online workshop that will help you master the art of making unique, Japanese inspired, Kokedama moss balls.

name: Terrarium Making Workshop
description: From a crafty little bonsai park to a fairy garden, there are no limits to what you can create in a glass bowl! Experts from samgardenstore are here to help you with the creation of a self-sustainable Terrarium! This 90-minute online workshop shares how to create a Terrarium, a mini world of lush & beautiful gardens!
